rooms.name: Superior Room
rooms.description:
Our standard rooms, measuring between 20-22 m2, overlook the garden, pool and tram route.

68 of our rooms are double-bedded (without balcony), 4 of them are double-bedded (with balcony), 108 of them are large-bedded (without balcony), 22 of our rooms are interconnected, and 2 of our rooms are decorated considering the comfort of our disabled guests.

All of our rooms, decorated according to standards, have a 28-inch LCD television, wireless internet (free), Pay TV (extra charge), minibar (extra charge), digital electronic safe, hair dryer, central heating and cooling system, telephone and 24-hour room service.

rooms.name: Suite
rooms.description:
Suite
Our suite rooms, ranging from 44 to 55 m2, overlook the garden, pool and tram route.

12 of our suites consist of a single bedroom and a living room (without balcony), 1 consists of a single bedroom and a living room (with balcony), 8 consists of a double bedroom and a living room (without balcony). 6 of our suites have a jacuzzi and the living room and bedroom can be divided with a wooden separator.

All of our Suite rooms, decorated according to standards, have a 40-inch LCD television, wireless internet (free), Pay TV (extra charge), mini bar (extra charge), digital electronic safe, hair dryer, central heating and cooling system, telephone and 24-hour room service.

rooms.name: Connecting Rooms
rooms.description:
Connecting Rooms
Our connecting rooms are 22 m2 in size and all our rooms have large beds.

All of our rooms, decorated according to standards, have a 28-inch LCD television, wireless internet (free), Pay TV (paid), minibar (paid), digital electronic safe, hair dryer, central heating and cooling system, telephone and 24-hour room service.
facilities: Non-Smoking Rooms, Connecting Rooms Available on Request

rooms.name: Disabled Rooms
rooms.description:
Disabled Rooms
Our disabled rooms are 28m2 in size and have large beds.

All of our rooms, decorated according to standards for our disabled guests, have a 28-inch LCD television, wireless internet (free), Pay TV (extra charge), alarm device for the hearing impaired, minibar (extra charge), digital electronic safe, hair dryer, central heating and cooling system, telephone and 24-hour room service.

rooms.name: Executive Suite Room
rooms.description:
How about enjoying the comfort of our largest (55 m2) executive suite rooms in our hotel, along with extra services and advantages?
All of our executive suite rooms have a partition to separate the jacuzzi and seating area, and all rooms have pool views.
facilities: Non-Smoking Rooms, Connecting Rooms Available on Request
